data.title: Nia Long: Knows Her Worth And Yours Too
data.meta_description: Listen to this episode from Let's Talk Off Camera with Kelly Ripa on Spotify. Kelly is joined by the dazzling actress Nia Long. The two dive into their lives on the soaps, being women in the entertainment industry and the co-stars who have had Nia's back. Nia shares a never before told story about walking off set in solidarity with her co-star and an airplane arrest in her twenties.
